features: 【5G & 2.4G Dual Band】The latest 5G & 2.4G dual-band light bulb camera have stronger signal reception, higher stability, longer distance to use, no lag and smoother real-time video compared to traditional 2.4G single-band lightbulb security camera. Simply screw camera light bulbs outdoor into the equipped E27 bulb base (AC110/240V) and plug it into a power outlet, download the EseeCloud APP and simply connect bulb camera 360 degree wifi outdoor to your home wifi.

【Two-Way Audio & Real-Time Alerts】Cameras for home security outside built-in microphone and speaker support two-way language real-time call, communicate with your family members or visitors without any obstacles, realize face-to-face communication. Light socket security camera can set up an audible alarm, when detecting moving objects home security cameras will emit a loud alarm sound and white light at the same time. Scaring away intruder and protecting the family safety.

【Motion Detection & Body Detection Alarm】The PTZ camera light bulb is equipped with a highly sensitive motion sensor that supports horizontal rotation of 355 degree and vertical flip of 90 degree, realizing 360 degree blind spot-free super wide-range accurate detection and tracking of objects. If you turn on human body detection alarm in APP, once security camera outdoor detects human body movement, security camera will record the movement and notify you via APP,thus reducing false alarms.

【2K HD Video & Color Night Vision Function】Outdoor cameras for home security supports 2K HD image, which is clearer than 1080P. The image is very clear in both day and night. Lightbulb camera supports color/infrared night vision, security cameras wireless outdoor can clearly monitor objects within 33 ft in low light environment, excellent night vision experience ensures your home safety 24/7.

【Multi User Sharing & Smart Storage】Lightbulb camera 360 degree wifi outdoor supports multiple users to watch videos. You can share the device with your family and friends for simultaneous monitoring through the app. Camera bulb storage supports cloud storage (paid access required) and up to 128G micro SD card storage.Outdoor camera is Alexa compatible, easy to install and simple to operate.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Security camera will only push alerts when they detect an entire humanoid, reducing false pushes. Next page 1 Night Vision 2 Real Time Alarms 3 Two-Way Audio 4 High Definition

Motion Tracking Light bulb camera has built-in motion tracking to detect and track moving objects, camera light bulbs outdoor lens is capable of tracking moving objects within 355 degree pan and 90 degree tilt. Lightbulb camera also sends real-time notifications to your cell phone when it detects a moving object. Surveillance Playback Lightbulb security camera supports 24/7 video recording and stores it to the cloud or TF card (up to 128GB, not included in the product), you can watch the playback through the mobile app at any time, so you don't miss any wonderful moments at home.

Is there any difference between a regular 2.4G bulb camera and this 5G & 2.4GHz? Ordinary 2.4G bulb camera is easy to be interfered by the signal, 5G& 2.4GHz camera has a larger bandwidth, compared with 2.4GHZ signal is more stable, the picture quality is more clear and smooth. Can APP connect multiple bulb cameras? I want to install one in my yard and indoor. Of course you can, multiple cameras can be added together within the app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this camera.
reviews.reviewText: I just put it into my front porch light. It was so easy to setup, it comes with a wall plug so you can set it up inside before you put it where you want it. What I like most about it is, it except 2.4 or 5 GB. The camera comes with lights and a siren, but you don't have to turn on the siren it has a on off setup. It has 4mp picture, it looks crystal clear. It has motion detection that follows what it detects if it is moving. Just a good security camera for the price less then $20.00, easy to setup it took me less the five minutes. It also has a setup for color vision at night or you can use black and white, I like the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's working for me
reviews.reviewText: This is my first experience with any kind of security device, so I have nothing to compare with, but I have to say, it has been reliable and efficient. It does not cut out on me, I am running it 24/7 with an SD card, and it has missed nothing. Day vision is great. I can see nearly everything on my block as I pan my camera. The sound is great too. A couple of days ago I could have (but didn't) eavesdropped on my postman as he was talking on a cell phone across the street. That's impressive. I like the way I can get playback on my smart phone--it's easy for me to check what's happened when I'm not home.Night vision had been great up to about 15 feet. I don't know if that is normal or not. I can see things that are close to my house very clearly, but it drops off quickly after that. I can see cars that pass in front of my home, but not enough to make much of them and people fade into darkness that pass on my sidewalk. But should anyone come close to the house, the view is great. It seems to follow people quite well most of the time. Though I live in a city, I have deer that come right to the porch at night, as well as feral cats, and I get good coverage of them. I had no idea a 12 point monster mule deer buck lived in my neighborhood but I have great night shots of him now.For the price especially, I am very pleased with this camera. I think I will look for another one that will give me better night distance and clarity, as I am specifically needing a camera for protection against a stalker, but I will keep this one running too. I've only had it a couple of weeks, but it has handled -20 temps at night and snow and has been a champ. And it was super simple to hook up and operate. If they are all like mine, I heartily recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth 20 and more
reviews.reviewText: Wow, figured I'd get what I payed for and surprisingly enough I was shocked at the quality, easy to set up and operate and don't need a 5th grader to teach me how. It has really nice picture and video and zooms in. I will be ordering two more of these myself very soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality security for a fraction of the price!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this security video device from Amazon. It works great! Has so many features that the much more expensive devices have. Yet this one is just a fraction of the cost! I also bought a simple clamp on trouble lamp, that I screwed the device into. Clamped it to the rafter on our patio. We can see out front gate, and all the way behind to our patio doors. It notifies us when human movements trigger a notification. I also li,e that it plugs in. No batteries or solar charging. So we can have it working under the roof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and responsiveness to motion
reviews.reviewText: I don't use the cloud, but keep the SD function. It was simple to connect except our light had an old wiring and so my hubby went ahead and updated it while he installed this. So, that was a bonus. lol. Clear pics and short 10 second videos. I've not got any msg that it's filled up or that I have to record over anything yet. It does tend to alert to our grill cover blowing in the wind alot. lol. I still haven't figured out how to delete events on the SD card usage because it seems to only allow that for cloud usage, but that's ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, great features for the price
reviews.reviewText: Already had the connection for a lightbulb I was not using. Bought this camera out of curiosity. Added 128GB fast SD card. So my total cost was only $32 and change. The camera comes with this Chinese app that I found easy to use. I’ve set preference, home spot as well as defining favorite spots. I don’t need it to patrol but I think it has that too. Since I have the SD card I did not need to buy any cloud service. The high def seemed a bit slower for my 2.4Ghz so I switched to the normal def. For the curious amateurs I recommend this highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There’s not much information in the manual, you’ll have to play with app settings to figure things out. I bought an SD card and it’s recording as it should and saving it. The only problem is, it doesn’t record or give me notifications all the time. It’ll do it for a bit and then stops and pick up again. I’ll keep holding on to hope that it’ll work with little flaws. The quality of the pics are good, no complaint. I also want to add as another buyer mentioned, it doesn’t always track motion, it hasn’t been consistently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Camera moves on its own
reviews.reviewText: I love the price, the ease of set up, how effective it is, BUT, I notice that the position I set in place seems to move on its own. Not sure if that's the wind or what but it's annoying. I can reset in the app, though which is fantastic.
